title: Riemann-Adelic Validation: Consciousness Bridge and Scalability Analysis
description: Analysis of ST.26 sequence mapping to quantum circuits and validation robustness across T~10^3 to T~10^8 scales

quantum_gates.hadamard_gates: Short palindromes (≤4 bases) → H gates for superposition
quantum_gates.cnot_gates: Long palindromes (≥5 bases) → CNOT gates for entanglement

consciousness_bridge.mellin_integration: Quantum probabilities → Adelic test functions → Mellin transforms

full_mode_T1e8.notes: v-adic corrections require parameter tuning for T~10^8 scale

robustness_assessment.D_s_Xi_s_equivalence: Maintained across scales with appropriate calibration
robustness_assessment.error_scaling: Exponential increase suggests need for refined adelic corrections
robustness_assessment.recommendation: Use light mode (T~10^3) for rapid validation, full mode for precision analysis

zenodo_publication_data.reproducibility: All code and data available under MIT license
